home.headerTitle: Your CHUV schedules, now digital and always at your fingertips
home.headerText:
No more lost or scattered paper! With our tool, your schedules become digital, accessible on your phone or computer.
Everything stays local on your device: no data is sent online, your information remains fully private and secure.
The ICS format – standard for digital calendars – lets you view your shifts easily and integrate them directly into your usual calendars.
home.stepsTitle: From paper to your digital agenda in 3 simple steps
home.step1Text: Enter your CHUV shifts quickly, offline and securely.
home.step2Title: Turn it into a digital calendar
home.step2Text: Your paper schedule becomes an ICS file, compatible with Google Calendar, Outlook or iCal, accessible anywhere, even offline.
home.step3Text: Your shifts are always available on all your devices. Check your schedule whenever you want, wherever you are, without searching for paper.
